name: Astronomic Date
description:
A dating sim in a form of a collection of 12 short dates with female characters from our previous games. Engage in dialogue and date activities with the ladies, win trust, turn up the heat, and if the date goes well, it can end with something really amazing. This is a casual game, meant simply more for fun than for challenge, and so most dates are pretty easy. However, some dates will be trickier than others. The characters come from a range of settings - sci-fi, modern, and fantasy.

The following are the characters from our past games that appear in this game as dates. (There is no necessity to play the games the ladies are from)
